description: University application tracking dashboard with AI-assisted task management

stories.title: Profile Tab — Personal Requirements Tracking
stories.description: New tab to track user's personal status: test scores, documents, deadlines. Shows what's complete vs missing across all applications.
acceptance: Profile tab in navigation
Editable fields: SAT score (target vs actual), IELTS/TOEFL, transcripts, recommendations, personal statement, application fee status
Visual indicators: complete (green), in-progress (yellow), missing (red)
Progress bar showing overall readiness %
Data persists to SQLite
stories.notes: Backend complete: GET /api/profile, POST /api/profile, GET /api/profile/readiness endpoints. ProfileService with default profile creation and readiness score calculation.

stories.title: AI-Populated Task Suggestions
stories.description: Auto-generate task recommendations based on university requirements and user's missing items. Not full AI — just smart defaults.
acceptance: When adding a university, auto-create tasks based on its requirements
Tasks linked to both university and global profile items
Example: 'Stanford requires SAT — schedule test' if profile.sat_score is null
Example: 'Upload transcript' if profile.transcript is false
Tasks have: title, description, due date (calculated from deadline), status, linked_university_id, linked_profile_item
User can accept, edit, or delete suggested tasks
stories.notes: TaskGenerator service implemented with generateTasksForUniversity() and generateTasksForProfileUpdate(). Tasks auto-created when university added or profile updated. POST /api/universities/:id/generate-tasks endpoint available for manual generation.

stories.title: University Detail View with Requirement Matching
stories.description: Click a university to see full details + which requirements you meet vs which you're missing.
acceptance: Modal or page showing university full details
Requirements section listing: SAT needed? (yes/no + your score), Transcripts? (status), Essays? (count + status)
Color-coded: green = complete, yellow = partial, red = missing
Quick links to edit profile items from this view
Show application deadline countdown
Related tasks for this university
stories.notes: Backend support ready (universities.requirements JSON, profile data, tasks). Frontend feature - reads from universities table + profile table + tasks table.

stories.title: Database Schema Updates
stories.description: Extend SQLite schema to support new features
acceptance: New table: profile (id, sat_target, sat_actual, ielts_score, toefl_score, transcript_status, recommendations_count, statement_status, fee_budget, updated_at)
Update universities table: add requirements JSON field (flexible schema per uni)
New table: tasks (id, title, description, due_date, status, university_id, profile_item_type, created_at, completed_at)
Migration script that preserves existing 7 universities
stories.notes: Migration system with schema_migrations table. Migration 2 adds profile table, requirements column to universities, profileItemType to tasks. All 7 existing universities preserved with requirements JSON populated from existing columns.
